Uses of Class
com.projetloki.genesis.image.Shape

  • Packages that use Shape 
    Package Description
    com.projetloki.genesis.image
    Library for rapidly generating CSS background images.

    • Uses of Shape in com.projetloki.genesis.image

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TextShape
      A shape whose interior corresponds to the rendering of a text.
      static class  TextShape.Glyph
      A single glyph in a text shape.

      Returns the shape obtained by reversing the interior and exterior of this shape.
      static Shape Shapes.plane()
      Returns shape that contains all the points of the plane.

      Shape Shape.reflectLeftHalf(double x0)
      Returns the shape obtained by reflecting the given left half-plane on the complementary right half-plane.
      Shape Shape.reflectLowerHalf(double y0)
      Returns the shape obtained by reflecting the given lower half-plane on the complementary upper half-plane.

      Shape Shape.reflectUpperHalf(double y0)
      Returns the shape obtained by reflecting the given upper half-plane on the complementary lower half-plane.
      static Shape Shapes.rightHalfPlane(double x0)
      Returns a shape that contains all the points P(x, y) which verify x >= x0
      Shape Shape.rotate(double theta, Point center)
      Returns the image of this shape by the clockwise rotation through the given angle around the given point.
      abstract Shape Shape.shrink(double margin)
      Returns the shape obtained by shrinking this shape, so that the distance between the boundary of each shape equals margin.

      Returns the translate of this shape by the vector with coordinates (dx, dy)
